charities.goal: To conserve nature and reduce the most pressing threats to the diversity of life on Earth.
charities.founder: Julian Huxley, Max Nicholson, and others

charities.goal: To ensure the ability of the Earth to nurture life in all its diversity.
To improve the lives of children through better education, health care, and economic opportunities, as well as providing emergency aid in natural disasters, war, and other conflicts.

To explore, enjoy, and protect the wild places of the earth; to practice and promote the responsible use of the earth's ecosystems and resources; to educate and enlist humanity to protect and restore the quality of the natural and human environment.
To end the destruction of habitat and slaughter of wildlife in the world's oceans, and to conserve and protect ecosystems and species.
To provide medical assistance to people affected by conflict, epidemics, disasters, or exclusion from health care.
To conserve the lands and waters on which all life depends.
charities.founder: Richard Pough, Nathaniel Owings, and others

charities.goal: To campaign for a world where human rights are enjoyed by all.
To conserve biodiversity and ensure sustainable livelihoods by transforming land-use practices, business practices, and consumer behavior.
To transform the lives of the poorest and most marginalized people by improving access to safe water, sanitation, and hygiene.
To promote understanding and protection of great apes and their habitats and to build on the legacy of Dr. Jane Goodall.
To work for the survival, development, and protection of children worldwide.
To develop and deploy advanced technologies to rid the world's oceans of plastic.
To protect animals and their habitats worldwide.
To provide humanitarian aid, relief, and resettlement to refugees and victims of conflict worldwide.
To protect rainforests and the rights of indigenous peoples in Central and South America.
To protect animals and their habitats through rescue, rehabilitation, and advocacy.
To serve individuals and families in the poorest communities in the world.
To create lasting solutions to poverty, hunger, and social injustice.
To work with communities to end world hunger and poverty and to care for the earth.
To advance cures and means of prevention for pediatric catastrophic diseases through research and treatment.
To end hunger and poverty by empowering people to lead lives of self-reliance, meet their own basic needs, and build better futures.
To advance women's rights and gender equality by making grants to support women-led organizations around the world.
To bring clean and safe drinking water to people in developing countries.
To save wildlife and wild places around the globe through science, conservation action, education, and inspiring people to value nature.
To provide lifesaving vitamins to mothers and children under five at risk of malnutrition, reducing preventable illness, blindness, and death, to create a healthier world.
To distribute long-lasting insecticidal nets to protect people from malaria in developing countries.
To protect and restore wildlife and habitats in the UK.
To prevent cruelty to animals and promote their welfare.
To eradicate illiteracy and provide educational opportunities to disadvantaged individuals across the world.
To provide emergency medical and primary health care services to people living in rural and remote areas of Australia.

charities.charity_charity_name: World Wide Fund for Nature Inc.
charities.goal: To conserve nature and reduce the most pressing threats to the diversity of life on Earth.
To improve the health of people in Africa by partnering with and empowering communities and strengthening health systems.
To accelerate the end of AIDS, tuberculosis, and malaria as epidemics.
To support communities in overcoming poverty and injustice.
To promote scientific research and education.
To end extreme poverty in the world.
To promote social innovation and to support activities that contribute to the well-being of humanity and the global environment.

charities.charity_name: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources (IUCN)
charities.goal: To promote nature conservation and sustainable use of natural resources.
To create a better world through education, healthcare, and research.
To promote literacy and education for all.
To end avoidable blindness and improve the health of Indigenous Australians.

charities.charity_name: Reggio Children – Loris Malaguzzi Centre Foundation
charities.goal: Promoting and defending the rights of children and young people as active citizens.

charities.charity_name: İnsan Hak ve Hürriyetleri İnsani Yardım Vakfı – İHH
charities.goal: Providing humanitarian aid and assistance to people affected by war, conflict, and natural disasters.
Assisting people with disabilities and those affected by poverty, conflict, and disasters to live dignified and inclusive lives.
To protect and conserve endangered manatees and their aquatic habitat for future generations.
charities.region_served: North America, Central America, South America, West Indies, Western Africa, and the Amazon
charities.founder: Jimmy Buffet, Bob Graham, and Judith Vallee

charities.goal: To improve access to quality education and opportunities for children and youth in developing countries.
charities.region_served: Africa, Asia, Middle East, and South America

charities.goal: To provide social welfare services, such as emergency medical services, shelter, and food, to the needy in Pakistan and other countries.
To promote freedom of expression and quality journalism in Norway and internationally.
